**Refined Command:** "Dmitriy : turn off all the TVs (AMBIGUOUS_DEVICE) and switch on the fireplace light (UNKNOWN_PARAMETER)"

**Confidence:** Low - The command contains an ambiguous reference to "all the TVs" without specific identification of which TVs to control, and there is no information available regarding the fireplace light.
